data.description:
In the world of Stilt, you are a furball with two arms. You were routinely flying your spaceship delivering gift packages until a giant octopus living atop a volcano decided to steal your spaceship, dispersing the precious cargo all over the hills. You equip yourself with a springy stilt in each hand to bounce through the challenging landscape to retrieve the lost gifts and eventually get back your stolen spaceship!

Stilt is a colorful, stunning VR platformer game that takes inspiration from classic platformers. Use your quick reflexes and problem-solving skills to progress through the levels, collecting lost gift packages and stamps along the way. With your wits and stilts, you can pass chasms, avoid traps, break things and smack creatures. Find power-ups to upgrade your stilts and become the ultimate stilt master!

Take part in several modes in various PvP arenas in cross-platform multiplayer! In Smack-em-all!, score points by smacking other players to sea. In Area Bash, gain points by staying inside a marked, constantly moving area while trying to keep other players outside. Try not to get zapped in Electric Tag, and pop the most balloons to win in Balloon Hunt. There is also a huge lobby area where you can meet up with other players and prepare your stilts for the next match.

Are you ready to jump around like never before? Put on your headset, fasten your stilts, and have some bouncy adventures in the world of Stilt!

Join Stilt Discord https://discord.gg/mYy9Z8axEm

changelog.change_log:
[New Feature] Added ability to dress up the player with different cosmetic options.
[New Feature] Added 20 findable cosmetics, one hidden in each level.
[New Feature] Players' mouths now move to match your voice in multiplayer.
[Improvement] Enhanced in-game UI interaction: you can now point and shoot at buttons within a certain area, in addition to physically clicking them.
[Improvement] Rearranged the main menu buttons to reduce clutter.

[Improvement] Added a new option to completely disable joystick turning for players.
[New Feature] Introducing "Floor Pop" arena game mode where players must outlast others by navigating disappearing platforms.
[Fix] Addressed several minor visual bugs.
[Fix] Resolved an issue that prevented players from entering the arena in private lobbies with more than four participants.
[Other] Internal improvements.

- [New Feature] Players can now choose their server region, either in the settings menu or within the group up room, providing greater control over matchmaking and connectivity.
- [New Feature] Introducing a new multiplayer level: Split Valley Woods. Explore this exciting new environment with friends in multiplayer mode.
- [Fix] Addressed minor level issues and implemented internal system enhancements for improved gameplay stability.
- [Fix] Corrected an issue where appear spikes causing damage did not align correctly with visual cues before initial strike.
- [Fix] Resolved an exploit where players could become invulnerable by pausing the game immediately after taking damage.
- [Fix] Resolved an issue where pausing during fog transitions into arena gameplay could cause the transition to become stuck.
- [Potential Fix] Investigated and addressed reports of players falling through the floor upon respawning at the boss level. Further testing is ongoing to confirm the effectiveness of the solution.

- [Improvement] Reimagined the visual effect when players are within bushes or trees. Instead of completely obstructing vision, the effect now conceals the object while displaying a transparent overlay, accompanied by a particle effect of leaves.
- [Improvement] Implemented controller vibration feedback for power-up activations.
- [New Feature] Introduced an option to restart a level directly from the pause menu.
- [Fix] Fixed issue where achievement "Don't look down" was not triggered.
